'''Mixed Yakisoba''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook.  The [[recipe]] for Mixed Yakisoba is obtainable from [[Shimura Kanbei]] at [[Shimura's]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Mixed Yakisoba revives and restores '''250'''/'''400'''/'''550''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Arataki Itto|Way of the Strong}}
